channel.title: Issues with hosting / Getting Friends on
channel.description:
Okay, i've started having issues with my severs. I've been using the 718+ Client and been running servers on it fine by my self but if i give the client to friends i know the issue! It's because they don't have the cache. How would i go about doing ? Auto updater? I've found no real guide on how to do it and what files can i do? It's really confusing. Any help would be nice, thanks guys! :D
If anyone could help via skype or anything? that'd be great too, just pm me.

item.title: Issues with hosting / Getting Friends on
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

givegprs:

Yes, I know that. How would i get players to get the cache?

If you’re leeching Matrix, which you most likely are, there should be no problem for the players to get the cache.

Read full topic
item.source: Issues with hosting / Getting Friends on

item.title: Issues with hosting / Getting Friends on
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

What? No… A 718 source has the cache. The client downloads the cache from your source files.

Read full topic
